title: Famous Stories Every Child Should Know
author: Various
snippet: Soon after, at the usual time, apparently the same horseand carriage approached the bridge from Charlestown square.

title: Famous Stories Every Child Should Know
author: Various
snippet: "I perceive my mistake; there isa ferry between Boston and Charlestown, there is no bridge.
